bike.description: S-Works SL4 FACT 11r carbon, FACT construction, tapered/shaped 1-1/8" to size-specific lower headtube, compact race design, Zertz, internal cable routing, carbon OSBB

components.description: S-Works Roubaix FACT carbon full monocoque, Zertz, size-specific, hollow carbon dropouts
1-1/8" upper and size-specific lower, hybrid cartridge lightweight bearings, 8mm carbon cone spacer, w/ 20mm of carbon spacers
OS integrated, CeramicSpeed, sealed ceramic bearings
S-Works CG-R, FACT carbon w/ Zertz, 27.2mm
